Container.Name: Proxmox-Backup-Client
Container.Overview: A Docker image to run the Proxmox Backup Server client and backup things from any directory mounted within /backups inside the container. In Advanced view, change the --hostname in ExtraParams to your Unraid server hostname. Warning: This template is not maintained by the author of the Docker image.

Config.Name: UNENCRYPTED
Config.Description: Set UNENCRYPTED=1 to bypass automatic encryption key generation and allow the backups to be unencrypted.

Config.Name: PBS Encryption Password
Config.Description: Encryption Password is Generated on first startup. Copy it from the console log and store it somewhere safe.

Config.Name: PBS Endpoint
Config.Description: URL or IP of your Proxmox Backup Server instance

Config.Name: PBS Datastore
Config.Description: Name of the Datastore you want to backup to.

Config.Name: PBS API Key Name
Config.Description: Use of the PBS_API_KEY_NAME and PBS_API_KEY_SECRET is recommended

Config.Name: PBS User
Config.Description: PBS_USER/PBS_PASSWORD is not required if PBS_API_KEY_NAME is set.

Config.Name: PBS Fingerprint
Config.Description: PBS_FINGERPRINT is required if using a self signed SSL certificate.

Config.Name: PBS Datastore Namespace
Config.Description: PBS_DATASTORE_NS is optional but should be set if using namespaces.

Config.Name: CRON_BACKUP_ONLY
Config.Description: ADDED FOR INITIAL SETUP -- Set to 0 after initial backup is completed (and to confirm the backup occurs) If you want to skip backup on startup, set CRON_BACKUP_ONLY=1 otherwise CRON_BACKUP_ONLY=0

Config.Name: TZ=Etc/UTC
Config.Description: TimeZone. Used for backup date generation
